reports.sql: SELECT content_creator.name, count(*) FROM public.task, public.content_creator WHERE task.actor_id = content_creator.id group by content_creator.name
reports.title: My Name is Lakhan

reports.sql: SELECT task.status, count(*) FROM public.task, public.content_creator WHERE task.actor_id = content_creator.id group by task.status
reports.title: My Name is Lakhan 2222222222222222222
